name: OrderEmbedding.preimage_Ici
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
inst✝ : Preorder β
e : OrderEmbedding α β
x : α
⊢ Eq (Set.preimage (⇑e) (Set.Ici (e x))) (Set.Ici x)
decl: @[simp] theorem preimage_Ici : e ⁻¹' Ici (e x) = Ici x := ext fun _ ↦ e.le_iff_le

name: OrderEmbedding.preimage_Icc
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
inst✝ : Preorder β
e : OrderEmbedding α β
x y : α
⊢ Eq (Set.preimage (⇑e) (Set.Icc (e x) (e y))) (Set.Icc x y)
decl: @[simp] theorem preimage_Icc : e ⁻¹' Icc (e x) (e y) = Icc x y := by ext; simp

name: OrderEmbedding.preimage_uIcc
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : LinearOrder α
inst✝ : Lattice β
e : OrderEmbedding α β
x y : α
⊢ Eq (Set.preimage (⇑e) (Set.uIcc (e x) (e y))) (Set.uIcc x y)
decl:
@[simp] theorem preimage_uIcc [Lattice β] (e : α ↪o β) (x y : α) :
    e ⁻¹' (uIcc (e x) (e y)) = uIcc x y := by
  cases le_total x y <;> simp [*]

decl:
@[simp] theorem preimage_uIoc [LinearOrder β] (e : α ↪o β) (x y : α) :
    e ⁻¹' (uIoc (e x) (e y)) = uIoc x y := by
  cases le_total x y <;> simp [*]
